titles.title: For the relief of Vince Munoz, Governor of the Tribal Council of the Ysleta del Sur Pueblo and all other enrolled members of the Ysleta del Sur Pueblo.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 4/15/1999--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay an unspecified amount to a named individual for distribution to enrolled members of a specified Indian tribe in full settlement of all: (1) claims of the tribe arising from the taking by the United States of land owned or occupied by the tribe without payment for such lands of compensation agreed to by that tribe; (2) claims based upon fair and honorable dealings that are not recognized by any existing rule of law or equity; and (3) claims which otherwise, except for the lapse of time and the failure to timely file, would have been compensable under specified Federal law.
